sentences: Michel Henry Allan Zitron (Swedish pronunciation: [sɪˈtrûːn]; born June 29, 1981) is a Swedish record producer, singer-songwriter and DJ.
Zitron was born to a Romani father and a Finnish mother, and grew up in Tensta, Stockholm.
He attended a Finnish-language school until he was 12 years old.
On 27 July 2018, Michel Zitron along with John Martin launch a new music project called "VCATION".
Their second single, "When We Went Gold", was released on 21 September 2018.
